name: Goblin's Cave
description:
Game made for the Ludum Dare 48 - Deeper and deeper theme

Play as the prisoner of a greedy goblin, who force you to take back his gems from his mines ! But, be careful… monstres are roaming around.

Credits - 

Heine : the code minus the lightning system,
Redsorel : graphics,
Nocturne Games : lightning system,
DarkFantasy Studio : musics,
Zapslat.com : sounds.
